description:
~* Summate Mania For Free *~

It is an excellent application for kids to have fun with math and at the same time learn addition, subtraction, multiplication and division. Summate Mania is "your ultimate babysitter" since it engages kids while driving, riding a train or waiting in line.

Colorful design enhances the attraction of kids towards the game meanwhile increasing their capabilities of Arithmetic operations

Features:
> Cute graphics, cool animation & Best Sound effects!
> Endless fun for all ages.
> Many powerful items to help you win levels.
> Multiple game levels.
> Best Fun For Your Pass-Time!

Download now!!!
